```{r, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
SelectedDtaCNCL <- SelectedDtaCNCL()
        SelectedDtaCNCL <- select(SelectedDtaCNCL, -Local.Authority, -Domain)
        SelectedDtaCNCL <- arrange(SelectedDtaCNCL, Indicator, Year)
        indis <- unique(SelectedDtaCNCL$Indicator)
        lstGrps <- c()
        for(i in 1:length(indis)){
          rws <- sum(SelectedDtaCNCL$Indicator == indis[i])
          names(rws) <- indis[i]
          lstGrps <- c(lstGrps, rws)
        }
        kable(SelectedDtaCNCL[-1], format = "latex", booktabs = T, longtable = T, caption = "", align = "c") %>%
          group_rows(index = lstGrps,latex_gap_space = "1em") %>%
          kable_styling(position = "left", latex_options = c("repeat_header")) %>%
          column_spec(1:7, width  = "8em")
```
